'''Minecraft: Guide to Survival''' is a guide that contains various  tips, tutorials, and guides to survive your first few days in a new world.

== Synopsis ==
{{Quote|The world of Minecraft is waiting to be explored. But danger lurks around every corner and survival can prove difficult for even the bravest adventurer.<br>

The official '''''Minecraft:Guide to Survival'''''<!--the text printed on the book is bold and italic--> will help you stay alive. Learn how to find resources, craft equipment and protect yourself from hostile mobs.<br>

With insider info and tips from the experts at Mojang, this is the definitive guide to survival for new Minecrafters.}}
